alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 9:59AM CST until January 31 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Simpson and Copiah Counties. Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Rockport. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Water begins to back up into higher agricultural and pasture lands, mainly on the Simpson County side of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Saturday the stage was 28.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 28.5 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - - && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Pearl River Rockport 25.0 28.2 Sat 9 am CST 28.4 27.1 25.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 1000 PM CST.
